title: R44417
content: This report provides authoritative sources on cybersecurity policy issues for state, local, and international governments. It includes resources from various sources listed in reverse chronological order, focusing on materials published in recent years. The report serves as a starting point for congressional staff covering cybersecurity policy issues, with annotated descriptions of reports, websites, and external resources related to government efforts and international cybersecurity issues. The curr_chunk discusses supply chain vulnerabilities, Russia, intellectual property theft, China, espionage, cybercrime, national security issues, Europe, European Union, and United Kingdom.
